verses.verse: <S%H3303>Behold,<s%> you are beautiful, my <S%H7474>love.<s%> <S%H3303>Behold,<s%> you are beautiful. Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H3123>doves<s%> <S%H1157>behind<s%> your <S%H6777>veil.<s%> Your <S%H8181>hair<s%> is as a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H5795>goats,<s%> that <S%H1570>descend<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

Your <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are like a newly <S%H7094>shorn<s%> <S%H5739>flock,<s%> which have come <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H7367>washing,<s%> where every one of them has <S%H8382>twins.<s%> None is bereaved among <S%H7909>them.<s%>

Your <S%H8193>lips<s%> are like <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H2339>thread.<s%> Your <S%H4057>mouth<s%> is <S%H5000>lovely.<s%> Your <S%H7541>temples<s%> are like a <S%H6400>piece<s%> of a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> <S%H1157>behind<s%> your <S%H6777>veil.<s%>

Your <S%H6677>neck<s%> is like <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H4026>tower<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> for an <S%H8530>armory,<s%> whereon a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H4043>shields<s%> <S%H8518>hang,<s%> all the <S%H7982>shields<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>
Your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7699>breasts<s%> are like <S%H8147%H99999>two<s%> <S%H6646>fawns<s%> that are <S%H8380>twins<s%> of a <S%H7462>roe,<s%> which feed among the <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>

Until the <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H6315>cool,<s%> and the <S%H6752>shadows<s%> flee <S%H5127>away,<s%> I will <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> to the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H3828>frankincense.<s%>
You are all <S%H3303>beautiful,<s%> my <S%H7474>love.<s%> There is no spot in <S%H3971>you.<s%>

<S%H935>Come<s%> with me from <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> my <S%H3618>bride,<s%> with me from <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%> <S%H7789>Look<s%> from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H549>Amana,<s%> from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H8149>Senir<s%> and <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> from the <S%H738>lions<s%>' <S%H4585>dens,<s%> from the <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of the <S%H5246>leopards.<s%>

You have ravished my <S%H3823>heart,<s%> my <S%H269>sister,<s%> my <S%H3618>bride.<s%> You have ravished my <S%H3823>heart<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6060>chain<s%> of your <S%H6677>neck.<s%>

How <S%H3302>beautiful<s%> is your <S%H1730>love,<s%> my <S%H269>sister,<s%> my <S%H3618>bride!<s%> How much <S%H2895>better<s%> is your <S%H1730>love<s%> than <S%H3196>wine!<s%> The <S%H7381>fragrance<s%> of your <S%H8081>perfumes<s%> than all kinds of <S%H1314>spices!<s%>

Your <S%H8193>lips,<s%> my <S%H3618>bride,<s%> <S%H5197>drip<s%> like the <S%H5317>honeycomb.<s%> <S%H1706>Honey<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> are under your <S%H3956>tongue.<s%> The <S%H7381>smell<s%> of your <S%H8008>garments<s%> is like the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>
A <S%H5274>locked<s%> up <S%H1588>garden<s%> is my <S%H269>sister,<s%> my <S%H3618>bride;<s%> a locked <S%H5274>up<s%> <S%H1530>spring,<s%> a <S%H2856>sealed<s%> <S%H4599>fountain.<s%>
Your <S%H7973>shoots<s%> are an <S%H6508>orchard<s%> of <S%H7416>pomegranates,<s%> with <S%H4022>precious<s%> <S%H6529>fruits:<s%> <S%H3724>henna<s%> with spikenard <S%H5373>plants,<s%>

<S%H5373>spikenard<s%> and <S%H3750>saffron,<s%> <S%H7070>calamus<s%> and <S%H7076>cinnamon,<s%> with every kind of <S%H3828>incense<s%> <S%H6086>tree;<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> and <S%H174>aloes,<s%> with all the <S%H7218>best<s%> <S%H1314>spices,<s%>
a <S%H4599>fountain<s%> of <S%H1588>gardens,<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> flowing <S%H5140>streams<s%> from <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%> Beloved

<S%H5782>Awake,<s%> north <S%H6828>wind;<s%> and <S%H935>come,<s%> you <S%H8486>south!<s%> <S%H6315>Blow<s%> on my <S%H1588>garden,<s%> that its <S%H1314>spices<s%> may flow <S%H5140>out.<s%> Let my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and <S%H398>taste<s%> his <S%H4022>precious<s%> <S%H6529>fruits.<s%>
